Text:
Thanks for this. 

The files needed to run the game on kmeaw firmware 3.55 with multiman. Can be found here.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6659585

The game only runs in Mirror mode from external drive.

Mount with multiman then run from XMB with select + X.

Don't forget to leave a legit Blue Ray disk in drive, any disk will do.
